class.name: MountainBike
class.brief: Mountain bike implementation of a Bicycle.
class.doc: MountainBike is an implementation of a Bicycle providing a bike for cycling on rough terrain. Mountain bikes are pretty cool because they have stuff like **Suspension** (and you can even adjust it using SetSuspension). If you're looking for a bike for use on the road, you might be better off using a RacingBike though.

method.name: SetSuspension
method.doc: SetSuspension changes the stiffness of the suspension on the bike. The method will return false if the stiffness could not be adjusted.

return.doc: true if the suspension was adjusted successfully, false otherwise.
